title: ivf_lbr_prediction: Machine Learning Prediction of Live Birth After IVF Using Adenomyosis Features
description: XGBoost-based machine learning models for predicting live birth rates following in vitro fertilization (IVF) treatment, incorporating ultrasound features of adenomyosis based on the Morphological Uterus Sonographic Assessment (MUSA) criteria. This repository contains code for hyperparameter optimization using Optuna, cross-validation, model evaluation, and feature importance analysis using SHAP values.

creators.name: Björnsson, Ola
creators.affiliation: Department of Energy Sciences, Faculty of Engineering, Lund University, Lund, Sweden
